  • Method Details

    • displayWorld

      public static void displayWorld()
      Method to display the game world on the console. Loops through the 2D array representing the game world, and prints it to the console. Uses ANSI escape codes for colored text.

    • displayInventory

      public static void displayInventory()
      Displays the player's inventory in the console.

    • getBlockColor

      public static String getBlockColor(int blockType)
      Returns the ANSI color code for a given block type.
      Parameters:
      blockType - The type of the block
      Returns:
      The ANSI color code as a string

    • displayLegend

      public static void displayLegend()
      Displays a legend for block types.

    • getBlockSymbol

      public static String getBlockSymbol(int blockType)
      Returns a colored string representation for a block.
      Parameters:
      blockType - The type of the block
      Returns:
      A colored string

    • getBlockChar

      public static char getBlockChar(int blockType)
      Returns the character representation for a block.
      Parameters:
      blockType - The type of the block
      Returns:
      A char representing the block
